original_text:
Yet he filled their houses with good things—
    but the counsel of the wicked is far from me.
korean_text: 하나님이 좋은 것으로 그들의 집에 채우셨느니라 악인의 계획은 나에게서 머니라

sentences.original_text: Yet he filled their houses with good things
sentences.korean_translation: 그런데 그는 그들의 집을 좋은 것으로 채웠다

sentences.original_text: but the counsel of the wicked is far from me.
